long_description: Put an end to restless nights of camping with the NEMO Fillo backpacking pillow. Covered with a velvety soft microfiber, the inflatable pad is a combination of 3 in. air foam and 1 in. memory foam for adjustable height, stability and plush comfort. To give versatility for those who need extra loft, underside features an elastic cord that allows you to attach clothing to pillow for additional height. The elastic cord can also be used to hold the Fillo in place on an airline or car seat for lumbar support. Attached stuff sack lets you compact the NEMO Fillo pillow down to about the size of a 1-liter water bottle for easy packing. Removable microsuede cover is machine washable.
short_description: Put an end to restless nights of camping with the NEMO Fillo backpacking pillow.
